channel.title: [WikiLeaks] Afghan War Diary, 2004-2010
channel.description:
25th July 2010 5:00 PM EST WikiLeaks has released a document set called the Afghan War Diary, an extraordinary compendium of over 91,000 reports covering the war in Afghanistan from 2004 to 2010. The reports, while written by soldiers and intelligence officers, and mainly describing lethal military actions involving the United States military, also include intelligence information, reports of meetings with political figures, and related detail. The document collection is available on a dedicated webpage. The reports cover most units from the US Army with the exception of most US Special Forces' activities. The reports do not generally cover top secret operations or European and other ISAF Forces operations. We have delayed the release of some 15,000 reports from the total archive as part of a harm minimization process demanded by our source. After further review, these reports will be released, with occasional redactions, and eventually in full, as the security situation in Afghanistan permits. The data is provided in HTML (web), CSV (comma-separated value) and SQL (database) formats, and also was rendered into KML (Keyhole Markup Language) mapping data that can be used with Google Earth. Please note that the checksums will change.
http://wikileaks.org/wiki/Afghan_War_Diary,_2004-2010 :eek:

item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:42, topic:351207”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=447567.msg3290034#msg3290034 date=1280494090]

Xe Services LLC (formerly Blackwater USA) must be having a field day over there. I wouldn’t mind being a mercenary to be honest. I’m a problem solver and I think the war over there is quite a sizable problem… but solvable nevertheless.
[/quote]What war?

The war between the Americans (the good guys) who are fighting for the freedom of others and the terrorists (the bad guys) who are fighting for power over the region. Duh.[/quote]
No, its a proven fact that the terrorists in 9/11 werent linked to the middle east. George W Bush obviously saw it as an opportunity to go over and cease control of the oil in the area while covering with the war and ‘rebuilding’ the middle east. If you werent so fucking brainwashed you would have realized this by now. The whole war is a joke and is impossible to win.

item.title: [WikiLeaks] Afghan War Diary, 2004-2010
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:35, topic:351207”][quote author=goatee link=topic=447567.msg3289592#msg3289592 date=1280446571]
I’m loving reading these, seems mercanaries are used a fuck load in Afghanistan. I loled at this story:

(Delayed Report) At 0530Z ISAF reported an incident between LNs and members of Dynacorp in Kabul. ISAF reported 3X Nepalese members of a private security firm were trying to buy sheep in a local market when a fight broke out between the security team and the LNs. 1X LN was killed and 1X Dynacorps member was also killed. 2X Dynacorps members were wounded and received treatment at KAIA. The other two Nepalese left the scene in a taxi and were seen entering the US Embassy.[/quote]

Mercs were buying sheep? LOL.

I’m literally fascinated by this shit. NEED TO JOIN ARMY.

Mercenaries != us average military. Mercenaries can do almost anything they want because the cooperations have enough money to pay the media to not mention deaths etc. They’re only in it for the money.[/quote]

I didn’t saying Mercenaries were US military, I just found it ridiculous that they were buying sheep.

Read full topic

item.title: [WikiLeaks] Afghan War Diary, 2004-2010
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:9, topic:351207”]wikileaks’ mission statement is to expose oppressive regimes, that could mean powerful governments, large corperations or anything that is capable of royally screwing the common man or woman.

Right-wingers like Frell and mwiebelhaus are friends of these authoritarian governments and powerful corperations. But they are the enemy of every freedom-loving, life-living, democratic person.
They would destroy us, take us back to the dark ages if they could.
Their propaganda platform, Fox news, pumps out their rubbish into the airwaves.
They intentionally keep their public schools bad so children will grow up not being able to be sceptical and will be vulnerable to people poisioning their minds.

(of course, not all people with right-wing views are bad. A few of them have legitamate converns and arguments worthy of consideration)[/quote]
Im libertarian kk?

Also this is how it goes on the otherside
(of course, not all people with left-wing views are bad. A few of them have legitamate converns and arguments worthy of consideration)

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:8, topic:351207”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=447567.msg3285177#msg3285177 date=1280162359]
WikiLeaks is biased end of. I wouldn’t be surprised if they took anything that we did good out and left all the bad shit. Also nobody really gives a shit its not like its going to change anything, if the US thought they were a threat they would just shut them down quietly.

EDIT: Then I read this rofl

[quote]We have delayed the release of some 15,000 reports from the total archive as part of a harm minimization process demanded by our source.[/quote] sure…
[/quote]
I can say 2 things about that.

  1. Biased doesn’t mean they are wrong, just look at Penn & Teller, you know how its going in the first minute, but they are not lying.

  2. Of course they focus on the wrong about the war, this leaks i to show how bad the war have gone.

I suggest you go back to Fox News if you don’t like the truth.

EDIT: The server /IP is in Sweden is in Iceland, so USA could not just shut it down.[/quote]

You don’t live in America but you act like you know whats going on here. The sad fact is you have never watched any American news station but would love baseless comments.
Also if it really was A HUGE THREAT although only 1% of the population in America know not that wikileaks exists, let alone care that they only use there funding to uncover shit that will make America look bad.

Just like the the last video they released which turned out to be bullshit, I will love to see where this goes.

Oh yeah and @ yakman about 90% of the teachers in my public high school are very far leftwing liberals. My AP Gov class last semester had a teacher so far left it was hard to just let her sit there talk all of the bullshit, anybody who would actually argue the facts with here were sent to ISS for disrupting class. I think there may be a wide gap between the liberals in my country and the liberals in yours.

Read full topic
